Subscription.Description: User Account Added to Priviledged Group events. Targets: Vista+
Subscription.Query:
<QueryList> <Query Id="0" Path="Security"> <!-- Local Users added to a local security-enabled group will only --> <!-- send the SID value of that user to the collector --> <!-- User added to security-enabled group (Domain and local) --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Security-Auditing'] and (EventID=4728 or EventID=4732 or EventID=4756)]]</Select>
<!-- Modification of Security-enabled groups --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Security-Auditing'] and EventID=4735]]</Select> </Query> </QueryList>
